description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=2/3. Explore Peponi Island and get to know its inhabitants! Play mini-games, gamble for cash, buy and trade gifts and see if you can flirt your way to the top in this hilarious comedy RPG adventure!
